title: Nonabelian 2-Forms
abstract: We study gauge theories based on nonabelian 2-forms. Certain connections on loop space give rise to generalized covariant derivatives that include a nonabelian 2-form. This can be used to find rather straightforward expressions for the field strength and gauge transformations. As a special case we recover formulas for connections on nonabelian gerbe, as recently constructed in mathematics. The general construction gives rise to connections on algebra bundles, which might be relevant for D-branes in the presence of torsion. We construct BV sigma model actions for these connections and discuss their gauge fixing. We find both Yang-Mills type and topological BF type actions.
